mutants.mutated_line: mes = [ord(c) + ord('a') for c in message]

mutants.mutated_line: mes = [ord(c) * ord('a') for c in message]

mutants.mutated_line: mes = [chr(i * ord('a')) for i in mes]

mutants.mutated_line: mes = [ord(c) - ord('') for c in message]
